fields.name: lat
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: Latitude, decimal degrees of building centroid or entrance. (EPSG:4326)

fields.name: lon
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: Longitude, decimal degrees of building centroid or entrance. (EPSG:4326)

fields.name: name
fields.title: Place name
fields.description: A description that may help identify the facility (eg, '6 Smith St, Milton, Qld 4066' or 'Smith Reserve Playground')

fields.name: female
fields.title: Female toilet
fields.description: Female toilets are available (yes,no).

fields.name: male
fields.title: Male toilet
fields.description: Male toilets are available (yes,no).

fields.name: unisex
fields.title: Unisex toilet
fields.description: Unisex toilets are available (yes,no).

fields.name: female_ambulant
fields.title: Female ambulant toilet
fields.description: Female ambulant toilets are available (yes,no). Ambulant toilets comply with the AS1428.1-2009 standard.

fields.name: male_ambulant
fields.title: Male ambulant toilet
fields.description: Male ambulant toilets are available (yes,no). Ambulant toilets comply with the AS1428.1-2009 standard.

fields.name: unisex_ambulant
fields.title: Unisex ambulant toilet
fields.description: Unisex toilets are available (yes,no). Ambulant toilets comply with the AS1428.1-2009 standard.

fields.name: female_accessible
fields.title: Female accessible toilet
fields.description: Female accessible toilets are available (yes,no). Accessible toilets comply with the AS1428.1-2009 standard.

fields.name: male_accessible
fields.title: Male accessible toilet
fields.description: Male accessible toilets are available (yes,no). Accessible toilets comply with the AS1428.1-2009 standard.

fields.name: unisex_accessible
fields.title: Unisex accessible toilet
fields.description: Unisex accessible toilets are available (yes,no). Accessible toilets comply with the AS1428.1-2009 standard.

fields.name: unisex_accessible_room_width
fields.title: Unisex accessible room width
fields.description: Width of the unisex accessible room (in mm). Standard width is a minimum of 1900mm.

fields.name: unisex_accessible_room_length
fields.title: Unisex accessible room length
fields.description: Lenght of the unisex accessible room (in mm). Standard length is a minimum of 2300mm.

fields.name: unisex_accessible_seat_height
fields.title: Unisex accessible toilet seat height
fields.description: Height of the toilet seat off the floor (in mm) in the unisex accessible toilet. Standard height is 460-480mm.

fields.name: shelf
fields.title: Shelf
fields.description: A shelf is available in unisex accessible toilet (yes/no)

fields.name: shower
fields.title: Shower
fields.description: A shower is available within the unisex accessible toilet (yes/no)

fields.name: changing_place
fields.title: Adult changing place
fields.description: An adult changing place is available (yes/no). Changing places have full size change tables and hoists and comply with the changing places specification http://changingplaces.org.au/build-a-toilet/.

fields.name: handwashing_basin
fields.title: Handwashing basin
fields.description: Water is available for hand washing (yes, no)

fields.name: baby_change_table
fields.title: Baby change table
fields.description: A baby change table is is available. a special piece of furniture that you put a baby on when you change its nappy (yes/no).

fields.name: toilet_entry_signage
fields.title: Toilet entry signage
fields.description: Braile tactile signage at the entrance to disability toilet for visually impaired (yes/no)

fields.name: trsfr_side
fields.title: Transfer grabrail side
fields.description: Side the transfer grabrail is located for the unisex accessible toilet (left, right, both).

fields.name: week_open
fields.title: Weekday opening time
fields.description: Time the toilets open on weekdays, in 0-padded 24 hour time. Code 00:00 for always open or always closed.

fields.name: week_close
fields.title: Weekday closing time
fields.description: Time the toilets close on weekdays, in 0-padded 24 hour time. Code 24:00 for always open, 00:00 for always closed.

fields.name: sat_open
fields.title: Saturday opening time
fields.description: Time the toilets open on Saturdays, in 0-padded 24 hour time. Code 00:00 for always open or always closed.

fields.name: sat_close
fields.title: Saturday closing time
fields.description: Time the toilets close on Saturdays, in 0-padded 24 hour time. Code 24:00 for always open, 00:00 for always closed.

fields.name: sun_open
fields.title: Sunday opening time
fields.description: Time the toilets open on Sundays, in 0-padded 24 hour time. Code 00:00 for always open or always closed.

fields.name: sun_close
fields.title: Sunday closing time
fields.description: Time the toilets close on Sundays, in 0-padded 24 hour time. Code 24:00 for always open, 00:00 for always closed.

fields.name: comment
fields.title: Opening hours comment
fields.description: Any additional comments, such as for opening hours that canâ€™t be represented in the above scheme. E.g. If the toilet only open seasonally when people are in the area.

fields.name: access_cmt
fields.title: Accessibility comment
fields.description: Additional comments about accessibility, such as if the toilets are inside a building that is difficult to access, requires a fee to use, key to access, or can be accessed using a Master Locksmiths Association Key (MLAK)

fields.name: needle_bin
fields.title: Syringe disposal bin
fields.description: A syringe disposal bin is avaiable (yes/no).

fields.name: drink_tap
fields.title: Drinking water tap
fields.description: Drinking water is available (yes/no)

fields.name: operator
fields.title: Operator
fields.description: The name of the organisation managing the toilet (eg, your council name, or a business name.)
